metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3954 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
web2py before 2.14.2 allows remote attackers to obtain the session_cookie_key value via a direct request to examples/simple_examples/status.  NOTE: this issue can be leveraged by remote attackers to execute arbitrary code using CVE-2016-3957.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-3954` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-gluon - 2.12.3-1ubuntu0.1
python-web2py - 2.12.3-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: web2py package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.12.3-1ubuntu0.1').
